title: Fractal Trees - L-System
description: In this third installment of my series on algorithmic botany, I discuss L-systems and how they can be used to generate trees and other fractal patterns in p5.js.

codeExamples.title: Fractal Trees - L-System
codeExamples.description: This sketch uses a L-system to generate a fractal tree

links.title: Algorithmic Botany
links.description: The website of the Biological Modeling and Visualization research group in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Calgary.
